title: Daigle Bites
description: Completely unfiltered and off-the-cuff, “Daigle Bites” has a little bit of everything! A mix of commentary, music, and responses from pre-show Q and As, this new podcast from Lauren Daigle invites you behind-the-scenes to provide completely honest reflections and revelations about making it in music, finding your voice, her Louisiana roots, food, fun on the road, and more! Grab a cup of coffee, get cozy and hang a while.

episodes.title: 11. Daigle Bites - Look Up Child Anniversary (Pt. 2)
episodes.subtitle: Welcome back to part 2 of the “Look Up Child” Anniversary episode! This is an extension of a conversation between me and my dear friend Leigh Holt — who is also my manager! Our chat picks up right where the last episode left off, so if you...
episodes.description:
Welcome back to part 2 of the “Look Up Child” Anniversary episode! This is an extension of a conversation between me and my dear friend Leigh Holt — who is also my manager! Our chat picks up right where the last episode left off, so if you haven’t, go back and check it out.

Remember to make sure you’re subscribed so you don’t an episode, and send in your own questions to podcast@laurendaigle.com.

episodes.title: 10. Daigle Bites - Look Up Child Anniversary
episodes.subtitle: Welcome to a very special episode of Daigle Bites! We're here celebrating the 2 year anniversary of Look Up Child, and I thought who better to help me talk through how insane this journey has been than with somebody who has been here through it all!...
episodes.description:
Welcome to a very special episode of Daigle Bites! We're here celebrating the 2 year anniversary of Look Up Child, and I thought who better to help me talk through how insane this journey has been than with somebody who has been here through it all! My dear friend and manager, Leigh Holt joins me on this episode to talk through all things Look Up Child. 

We had so much fun chatting that we just couldn't stop -- so join us next week for part 2 of our conversation!

episodes.title: 9. Daigle Bites - Season 1 Bonus Questions
episodes.subtitle: Welcome to a special bonus episode of Daigle Bites! This episode was recorded back on May 8th, and features some of your fan submitted questions during the first season.  Make sure you're subscribed so you don't miss the debut of Season 2, and...
episodes.description:
Welcome to a special bonus episode of Daigle Bites! This episode was recorded back on May 8th, and features some of your fan submitted questions during the first season. 

Make sure you're subscribed so you don't miss the debut of Season 2, and remember to send your own questions to podcast@LaurenDaigle.com.

episodes.title: 8. Daigle Bites - George Floyd Reflections
episodes.subtitle: In this special episode of Daigle Bites, we share the audio from last week's Instagram Live.  At this time, reflect on loving your neighbor as yourself. Do not become complacent.
episodes.description:
In this special episode of Daigle Bites, we share the audio from last week's Instagram Live. 

At this time, reflect on loving your neighbor as yourself. Do not become complacent.

episodes.title: 7. Daigle Bites - Touring
episodes.subtitle: Welcome back to another episode of Daigle Bites! This week, we're talking all about touring. The lifestyle, the highs, the lows, and everything in between.
episodes.description: Welcome back to another episode of Daigle Bites! This week, we're talking all about touring. The lifestyle, the highs, the lows, and everything in between.

episodes.title: 6. Daigle Bites - Creativity
episodes.subtitle: This week on Daigle Bites, we're talking about creativity, art, self-expression and all the things that make this world such a beautiful place. Listen on in!
episodes.description: This week on Daigle Bites, we're talking about creativity, art, self-expression and all the things that make this world such a beautiful place. Listen on in!

episodes.title: 5. Daigle Bites - Louisiana
episodes.subtitle: This week's topic is very close to my heart. We're talking about the SWAMP of Louisiana! This place is so important to me, and I think everybody has a shred of affinity for their home town. Let's talk about it!
episodes.description: This week's topic is very close to my heart. We're talking about the SWAMP of Louisiana! This place is so important to me, and I think everybody has a shred of affinity for their home town. Let's talk about it!

episodes.title: 4. Daigle Bites - Childhood
episodes.subtitle: This week on Daigle Bites, we're reminiscing on childhood memories and how those moments have shaped me. Take a step back in time and tune in!
episodes.description: This week on Daigle Bites, we're reminiscing on childhood memories and how those moments have shaped me. Take a step back in time and tune in!

episodes.title: 3. Daigle Bites - Life Outside of Music
episodes.subtitle: We're back! This week, we're talking about life outside of music (if there is such a thing). Listen in!
episodes.description: We're back! This week, we're talking about life outside of music (if there is such a thing). Listen in!

episodes.title: 2. Daigle Bites - Identity
episodes.subtitle: Welcome back to the second episode of Daigle Bites! Today we're talking all about identity, seasons of life, and staying grounded. Tune in!
episodes.description: Welcome back to the second episode of Daigle Bites! Today we're talking all about identity, seasons of life, and staying grounded. Tune in!
